alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Cross (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 08 at 2:25PM CST until February 09 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: .Rainfall of 2 to 3 inches may produce flooding of small streams and low lying areas through tonight. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of East Arkansas, including the following counties, Craighead, Cross, Mississippi and Poinsett. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
